Detailed Description

Author:
Jack Owen Shelton CS4322 Project Predator VS. Prey Simulator.
Date:
Spring 2009Prey behavior for Prey that rather than runnning directly away from pursuing Predators migt change direction to within 30 degrees of the fleeing angle. Not practical, bt neat.
